EXPERIENCE 
Sales & Marketing Manager 
Ve Interactive, Asia Ltd. 
01/2015-01/2017 
HCMC,Vietnam 
Ve Interactive is a multi-award-winning technology company, serving over 
10,000 e commerce clients around the world. Working in 19 languages 
and with 26 offices worldwide, we implement online efficiency strategies 
for domestic and multinational retailers, increasing their online 
conversions by an average of 25%. 
Specialties: 
Re-targeting, Re-engagement, Conversion optimization, Website 
abandonment, e-commerce, digital marketing, Performance Marketing, 
Programmatic buying. 
•
Performed frequent and effective networking with a variety of business
partners and customers.
•
Built strong, lasting relationships with market players.
•
Built and maintained lasting and productive contacts with the media
•
Linked between suppliers, media and company clients.
•
Organized marketing research to implement brand awareness.
•
Defined, researched and monitor the market opportunities in Vietnam.
•
Conducted customer surveys to analyze the demands of the market.
•
Analyzed product and market pricing on a regular basis.
Sales training in Hong Kong and Singapore twice/ 3months.
•
Helped manage the administration, legal and financial duties of the
office.
•
Managed digital campaign across various media and demonstrate a
passion for excellent client servicing and project management.
•
Discovered and developed opportunities for marketing that involved
advertising on the Internet, regional/national as well as specialist
publications.
•
Managed the production of marketing materials.
•
Involved in all the 360-degreeintegrated marketing brainstorming and
planning session regarding the scale of the client’s campaign.
Business Development Manager 
KC Media 
 10/2013 - 03/2015 
HCMC, Vietnam 
This position works to improve KC Media market position and achieve 
financial growth then defines long-term organizational strategic goals, 
builds key customer relationships, identifies business opportunities, 
negotiates and closes business deals and maintains extensive knowledge 
of current market conditions. It is my job to work with the internal team, 
marketing staff, and other managers to increase sales opportunities and 
thereby maximize revenue. The key responsibility is to find potential new 
customers, present to them, ultimately convert them into clients, and 
continue to grow business in the future. Furthermore, this will also help 
manage existing clients and ensure they stay satisfied and positive. 
•
Prospected for potential new clients and turn this into increased
business.
•
Met potential clients by growing, maintaining, and leveraging your
network.
EDUCATION 
Diploma in Business 
Administration 
NCC Education Global Organization - UK 
TOEIC Test (520/600) 
& English Proficiency 
Course in 7 years 
VATC 
SUMMARY 
9+ years of in-depth involvement in all levels 
of marketing & sales, having sound knowledge 
of marketing & sales strategies and its 
principles, quick grasp of new technologies 
and market trends, with the ability to formulate 
strategies, make decisions, organizational 
skills and plan with confidence. 
•
Identified potential clients, and the decision makers within the client
organization.
•
Researched and build relationships with new clients.
•
Set up meetings between client decision makers and company’s
practice leaders/Principals.
•
Worked with marketing staff to ensure that prerequisites (like
qualification or getting on a vendor list) are fulfilled within a timely
manner.
•
Ensured all team members represent the company in the best light.
•
Presented business development training and mentoring to business
developers and other internal staff.
•
Researched and develop a thorough understanding of the company’s
people and capabilities.
•
Understood the company’s goal and purpose so that will continual to
enhance the company’s performance.
5 Years in High Fashion Retail Industry & Interior Design 
Ralph Lauren, Crocodile, Kartell Flagship Store, Van Laack. 
02/2008 - 08/2013
H HCMC, Vietnam 
-
My journey in fashion world started from a question: Why do they can pay
five thousand dollars for a bag or an evening gown? This question increased
my curiosity to make me have to find out the answer.
-
Half of the decade, I gained many valuable experiences in many working
fields such as: Operation Management, CRM & POS System, Storage
Management, Import & Export product or facility, Strategy Planning in Sales
& Marketing, Financial Management. Started as a Fashion Consultant in
Van Laack, I always followed my goal to reach to the level of Senior
Manager. Fortunately, I had a great chance to work for Crocodile Vietnam as
the Brand Manager in nearly 2 years.
